headline: Berkshire Hathaway: Warren Buffett Preaches Patience - I'm Following His Lead
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's capital allocation is disciplined, with prudent moves like reducing Apple and adding Alphabet. Read why BRK.B stock is a Hold.
